name: Nifty Cloud
tag_list: web-design, development, html, css, branding, saskatchewan
overview:
Nifty Cloud is a web development firm based out of Regina, Saskatchewan. Nifty Cloud provides professional web design and development solutions for individuals, businesses, and organizations.

We build beautiful, accessible websites, coded with valid HTML5 and CSS3, built on a WordPress or ExpressionEngine. We can also help to define your identity through logo and graphic design, and we help you to leverage your brand via social mediums.

Secondary mobile styling means your website is optimized for mobile browsers like those on the Apple iPhone, Google Android OS, and Palm Web OS. And, with keyword analysis and copywriting, we can improve your search engine ranking, and drive traffic to your website from Google, Yahoo, and Bing.
